caption1_text: Can you please identify which hand was mistakenly amputated?
caption2_text: When did you first encounter my client's balloon?
caption3_text: Your Honor may I have permission not to approach the witness?

caption1_text: Mind the whale dear.
caption2_text: They're very intelligent dear. Try reasoning with him.
caption3_text: Sure they're cute when they're little.

caption1_text: Two thousand eyes but it still takes you all day to read the morning paper.
caption2_text: Would your mother find chilled larvae in a light honey glaze too waspy?
caption3_text: Well it's another thrilling night at the Samsas’.

caption1_text: And best of all it's completely waterproof!
caption2_text: Maybe this thing isn't a compass.
caption3_text: Thank God for TiVo.

caption1_text: Wait. Would we still be doing this if the sky weren't falling?
caption2_text: Quack means quack!
caption3_text: So this is why you crossed the road.

caption1_text: Damn it I'm a brain surgeon not a rocket scientist!
caption2_text: It's the worst case of projectile dysfunction I've ever seen.
caption3_text: We thought it would look better with big breasts.

caption1_text: There may be some lingering resentment.
caption2_text: It's painful but I couldn't stand another chorus of ‘Take Me to the River.’
caption3_text: Watch out for the moose head in the parlor.

caption1_text: Sooner or later you're going to have to learn your way to the bathroom yourself.
caption2_text: We never get out anymore.
caption3_text: Try counting rats.

caption1_text: The hours here are obscene.
caption2_text: Let me call you back in an umlaut.
caption3_text: Oh sorry. I forgot about the time difference.

caption1_text: Aye and he replaced walking the plank with time out.
caption2_text: I'd mutiny but I'm having such a nice day.
caption3_text: No we don't get much booty but we meet a lot of nice people.

caption1_text: Take three thousand Tylenol and call me in the morning.
caption2_text: Really God you worry too much.
caption3_text: I don't know why you're so jolly—your cholesterol is through the roof.

caption1_text: O.K. let's wrap up and call it a day. I feel like we're losing our focus.
caption2_text: This new M.B.A. crop is so hard to break.
caption3_text: Just five more seconds and you'll break the record set by Tex and Dolly Rosenberg in Accounting.

caption1_text: We have company Henry. Use the good china.
caption2_text: He has his life and I have mine.
caption3_text: Can you tell it's a knockoff?

caption1_text: Two? Close enough—give 'em hell!
caption2_text: O.K. good.  Now who's the Deputy Secretary of Agriculture?
caption3_text: You've made me regret my purchase.

caption1_text: Jenkins if I want another yes-man I'll build one.
caption2_text: They're programmed to be idiots Higgins. What's your excuse?
caption3_text: You're voting with your pacemaker again Hargrove!

caption1_text: Wait this is yesterday's.
caption2_text: There's something about holding a rock in your hands that newspapers can't replace.
caption3_text: Same old same old.

caption1_text: Don't laugh.  He's made partner.
caption2_text: There's no good way to tell you this Carson—your job has been dogsourced.
caption3_text: He's a stray but I'm thinking of keeping him.

caption1_text: It was a big seller until we had to recall the cherries.
caption2_text: By golly Detroit is back!
caption3_text: Would you believe a kid came up with this?

caption1_text: It's not just that he walks upright and uses complex tools.  He also makes me laugh.
caption2_text: The fire went out.
caption3_text: I want to meet different kinds of Man.

caption1_text: They do say results will vary.
caption2_text: I thought it sounded reputable.  He's also a member for crying out loud!
caption3_text: That actor looks exactly like you!

caption1_text: This is the most advanced case of Surrealism I've seen.
caption2_text: Let's just keep an eye on it for a while.
caption3_text: The good news is all the pieces fit.

caption1_text: And make mine a decaf.
caption2_text: The board just voted to remove the net.
caption3_text: I'll take a cab.

caption1_text: Carol let's go ahead and keep the job posted for a little while longer.
caption2_text: No it's more of a gnawing ...
caption3_text: Mom tell Kevin to quit biting.

caption1_text: Of course the current tenant will be gone before the first of the month.
caption2_text: O.K. Second word four syllables.
caption3_text: I thought Ferguson hated quicksand.

caption1_text: Hmm. What rhymes with layoffs?
caption2_text: Some of you may be aware that I have been taking piano lessons.
caption3_text: And all because of the account that got awa-a-a-a-a-a-a-a-a-a-ay ...

caption1_text: It better work—they sold it to us.
caption2_text: If this doesn't work push that boulder and run like hell.
caption3_text: Our medicine man went to M.I.T.

caption1_text: Son one day all this will be yours.  Except her.
caption2_text: Son we finally attracted the fifty-foot-and-over demographic!
caption3_text: You know I couldn't have done it without your mother.

caption1_text: How about we just stay in tonight?
caption2_text: My mother is coming to stay next week.
caption3_text: Ever think about kids?

caption1_text: The elevator takes some getting used to.
caption2_text: Looks like another side-rise is springing up.
caption3_text: I think I liked them the other way.

caption1_text: It looks like someone's going to have the complete set!
caption2_text: Look honey it's the new Tickle Me Maniac.
caption3_text: I thought Grampy Willis would enjoy being exhumed for the holidays.

caption1_text: Actually it was more of a lateral move than a promotion.
caption2_text: O.K. I've backed everything up.  Now what?
caption3_text: Two for the price of one? Yes I may very well be interested.

caption1_text: Listen Satan can I call you back?
caption2_text: I gotta go.  ‘Mr. Wonderful’ is having one of his episodes.
caption3_text: It's like paradise for the first few days.  But you wouldn't want to live here.

caption1_text: You know how it is—first you buy the giant-screen television then nothing else seems to match.
caption2_text: It's down the hall but don't fall in.
caption3_text: Would anyone like 1/68th of a piece of toast?

caption1_text: So sue me.
caption2_text: So you're telling me I'm washing my hands for nothing?
caption3_text: Oh yeah like you had so-o-o much to live for.

caption1_text: Oh no! My best friend and my best friend's wife!
caption2_text: Interested in a threesome? I'll just sit on the floor and sort tax receipts.
caption3_text: How long has this been going on?

caption1_text: I support our troops as much as the next guy but do we have to let them play through?
caption2_text: If we truly believe in golf I don't think we have much of a choice.
caption3_text: Tom I think you should stop shouting ‘Bombs away!’ every time you drive the ball.

caption1_text: Next time just knock.
caption2_text: Good morning sir do you have time to answer just a few short questions for our survey?
caption3_text: O.K. now it's your turn to hide.

caption1_text: You don't scare me. I come from a long line of salesmen.
caption2_text: I'd like to talk to you about a unique opportunity.
caption3_text: Are you sure Mr. Coyote left no forwarding address?  This is going to be quite a blow to our sales team.

caption1_text: How many times do I have to tell you don't call me at work!
caption2_text: I keep telling him 'For God's sake put down the whip she has a learning disability.'
caption3_text: Yeah I know.  But who changes careers at my age?

caption1_text: Remember back when the worst thing you could catch around here was athlete's foot?
caption2_text: Don't ask me.  I don't know what to do.
caption3_text: Oh the rhymes I could tell you.

caption1_text: Yeah yeah—and I invented the ticket.
caption2_text: I'm going to let you off with a warning since you have no prior history.
caption3_text: Mind if I look in the hole?

caption1_text: If he's so damn intelligent let him get a job.
caption2_text: Come on George. You know he's only going to spend it on more oxygen.
caption3_text: Give him money and you feed him today; teach him how to earn money by somersaulting on cue and you feed him for life.

caption1_text: Perkins here representing taxes.
caption2_text: Marketing sent me.  I'm the new fresh face of death.
caption3_text: Well I thought it was funny.

caption1_text: So you <u>can</u> take it with you!
caption2_text: I guess membership does have its privileges.
caption3_text: Nobody brings what we really need—colorful stylish clothes.

caption1_text: You know I'm gonna miss this when we go paperless.
caption2_text: Auditing Siegfried and Roy has not been easy.
caption3_text: Remember Paul when we were interns?

caption1_text: Fine. If it's a boy we'll call him Boy. But if it's a girl I want to call her McKenzie.
caption2_text: I guess I always assumed we'd raise Dylan in the city.
caption3_text: Well you'll be a monkey's uncle.

caption1_text: Go fetch your mallet Wilkins—we'll play doubles.
caption2_text: I'm having my tech guys set them to music.
caption3_text: The negotiator for their union was very timid.

caption1_text: When you're finished here Spencer we'll need you on the bridge-to-nowhere project.
caption2_text: Let me know when the paint is dry.
caption3_text: Comrade Zinkov I would prefer that you spy looking through windows and listening through walls.

caption1_text: I’d like to get your arrow count down.
caption2_text: Have you tried sleeping on your side?
caption3_text: On the plus side it's a terrific example of Native American craftsmanship.

caption1_text: Don't tell Noah about the vasectomy.
caption2_text: I told you it was a couples cruise.
caption3_text: I think we should see other people.
